attributes.value: Sphingomonas paucimobilis NBRC 13935 genome sequencing project

assembly_info.comments:
Strain NBRC 13935 available from NBRC culture collection (http://www.nbrc.nite.go.jp/e/).
The NBRC Whole Genome Shotgun Project aims to provide reference genomes of NBRC culture collection strains for identifying useful genes for taxonomic classification, risk/safety assessment, and industrial application, and for understanding the structure and evolution of microbial genomes.
(http://www.bio.nite.go.jp/ngac/e/project_wgs-e.html)

bioprojects.title: Sphingomonas paucimobilis strain:LCT-SP1 Genome sequencing and assembly

attributes.name: isolation_source
attributes.value: water condensation from the Shenzhou X spacecraft of China collected during 15 days in orbit

attributes.name: biomaterial_provider
attributes.value: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre

attributes.name: collected_by
attributes.value: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre

attributes.name: identified_by
attributes.value: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre

biosample.biomaterial_provider: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre
biosample.collected_by: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre
biosample.identified_by: China Astronaut Research and Training Centre
biosample.isolation_source: water condensation from the Shenzhou X spacecraft of China collected during 15 days in orbit

assembly_info.comments: In fact, the Chinese Space Agency launched the Shenzhou X into space, which orbited at fifteen days in space. Before the spacecraft returned to Earth, the astronauts have collected the condensation of water in a closed and sterile test tube. After the spacecraft landed on Inner Mongolia Siziwangqi, Amugulang prairie of China, the ground staff immediately carried out the test tube. Several subsequent experiments were conducted, and Sphingomonas paucimobilis LCT-SP1 was isolated from the condensation of water. Hence, we believe that the strain LCT-SP1 was isolated from the condensation of water of Shenzhou X spacecraft. However, given that the Shenzhou X spacecraft including the astronauts is not directly connected with the space, we suggest that the strain LCT-SP1 comes from its terrestrial outsourcing and/or re-landing.
